trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for Dynamic Data table providers.
Table providers must extend this class.
LINQ to SQL classes and the ADO.NET Entity data model are providers that extend this class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider"></xref> class for use by an inherited class instance.
This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
The model that the table belongs to.
Gets the attributes that are defined for the table that is represented by this provider.
The attribute collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to delete items from the table.
The user.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is allowed to delete items from the table; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to insert items into the table.
The user.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is allowed to insert items into the table; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to read items in the table.
The user.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is allowed to read items in the table; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to update items in the table.
The user.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is allowed to update items in the table; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of columns in this table.
The collection of columns in this table.
Gets the name of the table from the data context.
The name of the table.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider"></xref> object.
For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the type that represents the table.
The type that represents the table.
Returns the value of a foreign key for the specified row.
The row to get the foreign-key value for.
The name of the foreign-key column.
The foreign key.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable?displayProperty=fullName> object that in turn returns the elements of the table.
The data context for the table.
An <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable?displayProperty=fullName> object that returns the elements of the table.
Gets the type descriptor for the table.
The type descriptor for the table.
Gets the name of the table.
Typically, this is the name of the table property in the data-context class.
The name of the table.
Gets the parent type.
The parent type if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"></xref> class.
Gets the root type for this entity.
The root type for this entity if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"></xref> class.
Returns the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider"></xref> instance.
This method is intended for debugging purposes.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider"></xref> instance.

If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the base class <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property is returned.
